name: AmionScheduleUpdater
purpose: Sync resident on-call schedules from Amion and QGenda (Momentum, Lightning Bolt) into the platform database for auto-assignment processing.

name: TangierScheduleSync
purpose: Synchronizes resident/provider schedules from the Tangier scheduling platform into MyEvaluations. Tangier is a third-party duty hours and scheduling system used by GME programs. This integration ensures schedule data is current for evaluation assignments and duty hours tracking.

name: UserArchiving
purpose: Automates the lifecycle management of user accounts. When trainees graduate, transfer, or become inactive, this scheduler archives their accounts according to predefined rules, sends notification emails, and ensures proper audit trail documentation.

name: Auto-File Evaluations
purpose: Automates the closing/filing of completed evaluations based on their scheduled dates, reducing manual administrative work and ensuring evaluations are properly archived on time.

name: FNPSalesForceIntegration
purpose: Provides logging infrastructure for the FNP Salesforce integration scheduler.

name: SalesForceIntegration
purpose: Pushes essential activities data (clinical hours, competency metrics) from MyEvaluations to SalesForce CRM for program tracking and reporting.

name: BSN Banner Integration
purpose: Synchronizes BSN program user data (faculties, students, preceptors) from the Ellucian Banner student information system into MyEvaluations, keeping the evaluation platform in sync with the institution's enrollment and staffing records.

name: ImportBannerLogsScheduler
purpose: Imports Banner student enrollment and course data for DNP programs into MyEvaluations on a scheduled basis, keeping academic records synchronized.

name: ImportFNPBannerLogs
purpose: Synchronizes Banner academic data (courses, FNP student enrollments, preceptor assignments) into MyEvaluations for the Chamberlain FNP program.

name: SSNEncryption
purpose: Critical HIPAA compliance scheduler that ensures all Social Security Numbers in the system are encrypted at rest. Processes SSNs by department to encrypt any newly entered or unencrypted values.

name: User Data Encryption
purpose: Provides data-at-rest encryption for sensitive user credentials by batch-processing unencrypted user records and storing encrypted versions, supporting security compliance requirements.

name: DEA License Reminder
purpose: Ensures healthcare providers receive timely notifications about expiring DEA licenses, which are legally required for prescribing controlled substances in medical education settings.

name: APE (Annual Program Evaluation)
purpose: Entry point for the Annual Program Evaluation reminder Windows scheduled task.

name: BNDD License Reminder
purpose: Ensures healthcare providers are notified before their BNDD (controlled substance) licenses expire, which is critical for regulatory compliance in medical education programs.

name: CME Evaluation Reminder
purpose: Automates reminder emails for CME conference evaluation assignments, ensuring healthcare professionals complete their required evaluations for continuing education credits.

name: Evaluation Reminder (Core)
purpose: Core scheduler that sends evaluation reminder emails to all users with pending evaluations across all departments. This is the primary driver for evaluation completion rates across the entire MyEvaluations platform.

name: LicenseReminders
purpose: Keep physicians compliant with ECFMG, AOA, and ACOS certification requirements by sending timely renewal reminders.

name: MidtermFinalEvaluationReminderFacultyPrecep
purpose: Notify faculty and preceptors to complete midterm and final evaluations on schedule for each clinical department.

name: QuizReminders
purpose: Ensures trainees receive timely reminders about pending quiz assignments and partially completed quizzes, supporting assessment completion rates in education programs.

name: StateLicenseReminders
purpose: Ensures healthcare providers receive timely reminders about upcoming state license expirations. State licensure is a mandatory compliance requirement for medical practice, and expired licenses can result in inability to practice.

name: Certificate Expiration Reminder
purpose: Automates notifications about expiring professional certificates (e.g., board certifications, specialty certificates) for healthcare education program participants.

name: Curricula Email Notifications
purpose: Automates email notifications for curricula assignments including document reviews, rotation-based curricula assignments, and self-assessment reminders for educational program participants.

name: InboxReminder
purpose: Drives the platform-wide inbox evaluation reminder system, notifying users across all departments when they have pending evaluations.

name: Learning Assignments Reminder
purpose: Ensures assessors and preceptors receive timely email reminders about pending learning module assignments they need to complete or review, improving assignment completion rates.

name: LiabilityInsReminder
purpose: Ensure physicians and nurses renew liability insurance by sending automated expiration reminder emails to maintain compliance.

name: MailDistribution
purpose: Process the platform's outgoing mail queue to deliver bulk institutional emails with document attachments.

name: FNPClinicalLogsReminder
purpose: Coordinates sending of FNP clinical logs reminder emails (midterm, final, week-8) and logs job history to the database.

name: Patient Log Reminder
purpose: Ensures timely review of patient encounter logs by sending reminders to reviewers, which is essential for clinical training documentation and accreditation compliance.

name: PatientLog
purpose: Ensures patient log entries containing sensitive data (patient IDs, names) are encrypted per department, maintaining HIPAA compliance for patient information stored in clinical logs.

name: Procedure Log Reminder
purpose: Ensures timely submission and review of medical procedure logs by sending reminders to users, which is required for tracking procedural competencies in medical education.

name: Duty Hours Logging Reminder
purpose: Ensures residents and trainees log their duty hours on time by sending automated reminders, supporting ACGME work-hour compliance requirements.

name: Duty Hours Verification Reminder
purpose: Automates reminders for residents and trainees to verify their clinical/duty hours, which is required by ACGME for work-hour compliance in graduate medical education programs.

name: MilestoneScores
purpose: Recalculates and updates milestone narrative scores for residents/trainees, ensuring ACGME milestone assessments reflect the latest evaluation data.

name: Accreditation Compliance
purpose: Sends automated email notifications about upcoming accreditation compliance deadlines across departments, including citation and adverse action information for GMEA and non-GMEA programs.

name: Affiliate Agreement Notices
purpose: Automates notifications about expiring affiliate agreements between healthcare education institutions and their clinical training sites, ensuring timely renewals.

name: ApplicationEmails
purpose: The primary email sending engine for the entire platform. Reads queued emails from the database and dispatches them via SMTP, covering virtually every notification type in the system including evaluations, compliance reminders, onboarding, and administrative notices.

name: Conference Evaluation Emails
purpose: Automates the conference evaluation workflow by sending evaluation assignment emails to attendees after conferences and auto-closing expired evaluations, which is essential for CME/conference tracking.

name: ConferenceReminders
purpose: Ensures conference attendees receive timely reminders to complete their evaluation forms for conferences and grand rounds they attended. Supports GME conference attendance tracking and evaluation compliance.

name: Contract Expiration Notice
purpose: Notifies administrators and users about expiring employment or training contracts, ensuring timely renewals and preventing lapses in contractual coverage.

name: DevryArchiving
purpose: Automates user archiving for DeVry University programs (both standard and FNP tracks), ensuring graduated or inactive students are properly archived with email notifications.

name: Excused Rotation Auto-Populate
purpose: Reduces administrative burden by automatically carrying forward excused conference rotation settings from one academic year to the next, ensuring continuity in rotation scheduling.

name: ExportBSNLogs
purpose: Syncs BSN clinical log data and attendance records from MyEvaluations to the Banner/Salesforce external system for Chamberlain BSN programs.

name: File to Binary Conversion
purpose: Migrates document files from the server file system into database binary storage for better portability, backup, and centralized document management.

name: FNP Evaluation Assignments
purpose: Automates the creation of evaluation assignments for FNP (Family Nurse Practitioner) program students, ensuring evaluations are assigned on schedule without manual intervention.

name: FNPDeleteDroppedCourseEvaluation
purpose: Alerts the admin team via email when the FNP dropped course evaluation deletion process fails.

name: FNPFIleDownload
purpose: Enables FNP program coordinators to download clinical case log reports as Excel or XML files by processing pending download requests from the database.

name: FNPImmersionNotification
purpose: Notifies FNP (Family Nurse Practitioner) students about upcoming immersion experiences, which are required in-person clinical training sessions.

name: FNPStudentLogReview
purpose: Auto-files overdue FNP evaluations by querying scheduled evaluation data and delegating the filing operation to EvaluationsData.

name: GenerateCourseInstructorWeeklyNotifications
purpose: Provides logging for the course instructor weekly notifications scheduler.

name: ImportPatientPulse
purpose: Imports patient satisfaction survey data from PatientPulse for participating departments into MyEvaluations to track clinical encounter feedback.

name: InCorrectSyncReminderToAdmins
purpose: Alerts administrators to AMION/OnCall sync mismatches (users, rotations, calls, clinics) so they can correct incorrect schedule synchronizations.

name: InitiateProcedureMVCApplication
purpose: Warm-start the Procedure MVC application by hitting key routes so IIS pre-compiles views before users arrive.

name: MailgunService
purpose: Provide a typed error event for ASP.NET health monitoring integration in the Mailgun service.

name: MailgunWebhookService
purpose: Incrementally sync Mailgun delivery events (including clicks, opens, failures) from webhook logs into the platform database.

name: ManualAssignments
purpose: Ensures evaluators receive reminder emails about manually-created evaluation assignments that are pending completion, with department-specific reminder schedules and email templates.

name: NotificationService
purpose: Deliver in-app push notifications to Android users (residents, faculty) for evaluation assignments and reminders.

name: OnboardingAssignmentReminder
purpose: Provide structured logging for the onboarding assignment reminder scheduler.

name: OnCallAutoAssignment
purpose: Automatically create evaluation assignments for residents based on their on-call schedule data from Amion and QGenda.

name: PatientName
purpose: Encrypts patient name fields in procedure records per department, ensuring PII in clinical procedure data is protected at rest.

name: PIPReEvaluation
purpose: Ensures that faculty and program directors receive timely reminders about pending PIP re-evaluations for residents/trainees who are on performance improvement plans.

name: PracticumHours
purpose: Keeps nursing/FNP students informed about their clinical practicum hours progress, which is required for program completion and accreditation.

name: RotationRequirements
purpose: Manages rotation-based milestone requirement tracking and notifications for GME programs. Ensures trainees and faculty are notified about rotation requirements, learning documents are uploaded to the file server, and PIP evaluations are triggered when needed.

name: SignatureDocuments
purpose: Automates the collection of electronically signed onboarding/credentialing documents. Integrates with RightSignature and HelloSign APIs to retrieve completed documents and store them in the institution's file system for compliance records.

name: StudentReviewLog
purpose: Ensures faculty preceptors receive daily notifications about student clinical logs awaiting their review, supporting timely feedback in nursing/FNP programs.

name: SystemComments (AI/MyInsights)
purpose: The AI/MyInsights engine for the platform. Generates AI-powered narrative analysis, milestone score predictions (NPV), and competency-based comments by sending evaluation data to an external AI service. This is critical for the MyInsights feature that provides data-driven insights to program directors about resident/student performance.
